1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Love, the central character, is a certified psychologist who specializes in dealing with wayward and rebellious youths. She is currently preparing for her wedding with Maksim. One night when driving home, Max and Love are involved in an accident after their car hits a man on the road. On examining the body, Max is shocked to discover that the man is dead. Please turn on Closed Captions.
